Name: PingBall VR
About the game: PingBall is an easy to grasp, physically accurate and intuitive crossover between racquetball and breakout. Your goal is to clear multiple levels by breaking bricks while swinging a racquet. There are currently 20 original levels design with difficulty and obstacles variation (even disrupting fans!). But it doesn't stop there: after you complete a full round, the next 20 levels require bricks to be hit twice while their size get smaller or pulsate, for a total of 120 different experiences! Some bricks have power-up like extra ball, multi-ball, slow-time. ghost or gravity modifier. The game includes both a local and online Score board per difficulty to track your improvements. It is an excellent workout and it is fun to play!
